content:
The Celino delivers a rich, layered, South Beach oceanfront experience inspired by Floridian and Cuban culture. Enjoy breakfast, lunch, dinner, or late night bites at Pubblica or Dalia, grab cocktails by the pool, or dance the night away in the Bar at Dalia. 

Pubblica, Dalia, and the Bar at Dalia are accessible. For more information, please view our Accessibility Statement.
